r.d: Modyllic, PHP SQL Parser and schema management tool
r.n: * Call CREATE TABLE correctly for SQLMETA * Full support for 5.2-5.4 testing via Travis-CI * Switch to using an auto loader NOTE: This means that any commandline tools will need to be updated to load the autoloader. * Lots of refactoring to support the autoloader * Strictness related cleanup: * Declare our abstract classes * Add private constructors to static-only classes * Add type hints to our methods (#140) * Fix #109, allow index comparisions able to be aware of column name aliases. * Fix #33-- binary types never emit charset data
